sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source2

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
source1, source2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Join2
transformations.script:
Join1, source3 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
